name: Dodgy Trolley Shopping
description:
We all know the feeling of getting that one shopping trolley that always  fights you as you push it around the supermarket. Now, relive that experience! Race to collect the items on your list whilst trying to cause as little damage as possible. Swear as your trolley constantly pulls you in one direction or suddenly lurches you into the shelves! You'll have minutes of fun!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ "I'm so proud of you two boys!" - Our Mothers

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Created By Sam Elwes and Jonathan Jackson.

Sound Effects obtained from:

https://www.zapsplat.com/ 
https://www.freesfx.co.uk/ 
https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
https://freesound.org/people/aboe/
